message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $12,000. Considering my costs and the effort put into creating this product, I'm offering it to you at a special introductory price of $10,000. This is a fantastic opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a discount. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
